column1: text
#Ottawa police confirm shooting at War Memorial. Reports say victim may be a soldier.
Only photo I will tweet. CPR being performed on the soldier now. I heard four shots. #ottawa http://t.co/cqdw1yx8AI
At the war memorial in. Ottawa. A soldier has been shot. They are giving him treatment now. #breaking http://t.co/cTmlb1LvgG
Uniformed Canadian soldier shot at War Memorial in #Ottawa.
Shots fired on parliament hill after a man walked up with a gun. I'm locked in a security office on parliament hill
